text: Ej Muhammad, cun ʙandagoni Man dar ʙorai Man az tu ʙipursand, Man ʙa onho nazdikam va ʙa nidoi kase, ki Manro ʙixonad, çavoʙ mediham. Pas Manro dar on ci ki onhoro farmudaam va az on ci ki onhoro man' namudaam, ito'at kunand. Va ʙa Man imon orand. Boşad, ki rohi oʙodii dinu dunjoaşonro darjoʙand
